exec: pm.test("Body matches and contains pertinentAdditionalInstructions ", function () {

let code = $('ParentPrescription > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentAdditionalInstructions > code').attr('code');
pm.test("pertinentAdditionalInstructions value is 'Your medication review is due. Please make an appointment to see your GP' (Element Attribute)",

let value = $('ParentPrescription > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > pertinentInformation2 > pertinentLineItem > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentAdditionalInstructions > value').text();
pm.expect(value).to.eql('Your medication review is due. Please make an appointment to see your GP');
